title: Setup CI/CD
description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment to staging environment.

title: Test
description: Set up the initial project structure and repository with README and basic folder organization.

title: Implement Login
description: Develop the login functionality with email/password authentication, including validation and error handling.

title: Design Landing Page
description: Create a responsive landing page layout using Figma designs. Include hero section, features, and footer.

title: Write Unit Tests
description: Add unit tests for authentication module using Jest. Ensure at least 80% coverage.

title: Fix Navbar Bug
description: Resolve issue where the navigation bar overlaps content on mobile screens.

title: Implement Dark Mode
description: Add dark mode toggle for the application, store user preference in local storage.

title: Optimize Images
description: Compress and optimize all images to improve page load speed without losing quality.

title: Update Dependencies
description: Update all npm packages to latest stable versions and test for breaking changes.

title: Client Feedback Review
description: Go through the client feedback document and create tickets for requested feature changes.

title: Database Backup
description: Schedule automated daily backups of production database and verify restore process.

title: User Profile Page
description: Design and implement the user profile page including editable fields, avatar upload, and password change.

title: Bug Fix: Payment Gateway
description: Investigate and fix errors occurring during payment processing for credit card transactions.

title: Write Documentation
description: Document API endpoints, authentication flow, and database schema for the development team.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the latest release to the production server and monitor logs for any errors.
